Trustee_18_pre_2.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_2.content: Isabella Costa demonstrated excellent trustworthiness and competence throughout the investment process by proposing a fair allocation plan and achieving a 100% return on the investment. Her commitment to transparency and equitable distribution of profits reflects positively on her pro-sociality, fostering strong relationships with investors. As she had no prior rejections or negative encounters with investors, her reputation is now enhanced significantly.

Investor_18_pre_4.name: Isabella Costa
Investor_18_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I exhibited high levels of trustworthiness and pro-sociality by ensuring transparency and alignment with the trustee's allocation plan. My ethical approach and commitment to mutual growth have solidified my reputation as a reliable investor in the community.
